title: TFT gunslinger bug?
body: Hey i think that Tristana is bugged in TFT on live. I had RFC + Rageblade on her and 4 gunslinger bonus, it seemed that the attack speed bonus did not apply to the extra attacks. EUW btw.

replies.body: Similar bug - When I put a Rageblade on Blademaster Trist, her Attack speed change from 1.somethin to 2. something and back and forth every second.  Not sure what was going on there (I kept right clicked her just to check)
I've noticed this normally.  I don't think the gunslinger or blademaster bonuses counter toward Rageblade (though I could be mistaken).
